Maintenance fee includes ALL utilities & even includes PROPERTY TAXES (same amount for owner occupant or investor because it’s a Coop) saving you hundreds of dollars monthly! Don’t miss out on this rare opportunity to experience what oceanfront living on the Gold Coast is all about.
